DataElement.preferredName: Next Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Occurrence Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An explanation that describes the reason for the subsequent hematopoietic cell transplantation.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Subsequent; immediately following in time or order._Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_The replacement of tissue with tissue from the person's own body or from another person._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Subsequent; immediately following in time or order.:Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual.

Concepts.definition: Subsequent; immediately following in time or order.

Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Subsequent; immediately following in time or order._Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

PermissibleValues.value: Only if the patient fails to respond or has an incomplete response
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Single Patient Failure Response Or Incomplete Response

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Single Patient Failure Response Or Incomplete Response
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.: A lack of occurrence or performance.: Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Not whole; lacking some necessary part or detail; unfinished.: Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

Concepts.definition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A lack of occurrence or performance.
Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

PermissibleValues.value: Only if the patient responds to cellular therapy
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Single Patient Response To Cellular Therapy

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Single Patient Response To Cellular Therapy
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.: Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: Utilization of specific cells, modified or not, for treatment of diseases. Donor lymphocyte infusion is a type of cellular therapy.

Concepts.definition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
Utilization of specific cells, modified or not, for treatment of diseases. Donor lymphocyte infusion is a type of cellular therapy.

PermissibleValues.value: Regardless of response to cellular therapy

Donor lymphocyte infusion is a type of cellular therapy.

Utilization of specific cells, modified or not, for treatment of diseases. Donor lymphocyte infusion is a type of cellular therapy.
